title: Spearman Rank Coefficient ($\rho$)
---

Abbreviations & other names: 

- $\rho$
- r~s~


# Comparison to other tests

[See Spearman Rank coefficient ($\rho$) vs pearson product-moment correlation (r) vs linear regression]({{< var ref-linear-correlation.path >}})

# Purpose

- Similar to Pearson Correlation Coefficient @schoberCorrelationCoefficientsAppropriate2018
- Ordinal data  @schoberCorrelationCoefficientsAppropriate2018
- Not restricted to Continuous variables  @schoberCorrelationCoefficientsAppropriate2018
- Ranking converts nonlinear data into a linear relationship  @schoberCorrelationCoefficientsAppropriate2018

Measure: Strength of relationship between the ranks of the values of 2 variables  @schoberCorrelationCoefficientsAppropriate2018

# Range
-1 to +1  @schoberCorrelationCoefficientsAppropriate2018

# Interpretation

Observed correlation does NOT assume causation only Association  @schoberCorrelationCoefficientsAppropriate2018
